operations.notes:
Create a CPA Alarm with the supplied parameters.
Any combination of tracks within the given parameters will trigger the alarm (seen as an alert).
See the "Parameters" section for details of these parameters.

parameters.name: alarmCpaInput
parameters.description:
Parameters to create a CPA Alarm.
Note that both distance and time are required.
A copy and pastable example of settings is:
{ "distance": 500,
"time": 300
}

responseMessages.message: Accepted (the request to build the resource has been accepted but the resource itself is not yet necessarily created)
Bad Request. Typically invalid or incomplete parameter(s). See the 'message' property for detail of the error.
Insufficient authorization. Basic Authentication is missing, invalid, or permissions are insufficient for the operation.

operations.summary: Add the track to the specified Alarm
operations.notes:
This adds the requested track to the Alarm.
If the track is already associated with the alarm no change is made and the request is accepted. (Note that if the track doesn't exist in the system then a 'Resource not found status' is returned.)

parameters.name: trackId
parameters.description:
the track id (e.g. 'COM0100100').
Format is <"COM"|"SYS"|"SEN"><TSI> <CTI>

The first three characters represent the current tracker mode,
  COM=Composite Tracker,
  SYS=System Tracker and
  SEN = Sensor Tracker.
The next 2 digits represent the Tracker Unit Number (TSI).
The last 5 digits represent the Local Track ID (CTI)
(and must be exactly 5 digits long to be valid).

Example Value: 'COM0100002' is from the Composite Tracker, uses 1 as the TSI and 2 as the CTI.

responseMessages.message: Accepted (the request to update the resource has been accepted but the resource itself is not yet necessarily updated.)
Bad Request. Typically invalid or incomplete parameter(s). See the 'message' property for detail of the error.
Insufficient authorization. Basic Authentication is missing, invalid, or permissions are insufficient for the operation.
No such Alarm or Track found

operations.summary: Remove the track from the specified Alarm
operations.notes:
This removes the track from the Alarm.
If the track isn't already associated with the alarm no change is made and the request is still accepted.

parameters.name: trackId
parameters.description:
the track id (e.g. 'COM0100100').
Format is <"COM"|"SYS"|"SEN"><TSI> <CTI>

The first three characters represent the current tracker mode,
  COM=Composite Tracker,
  SYS=System Tracker and
  SEN = Sensor Tracker.
The next 2 digits represent the Tracker Unit Number (TSI).
The last 5 digits represent the Local Track ID (CTI)
(and must be exactly 5 digits long to be valid).

Example Value: 'COM0100002' is from the Composite Tracker, uses 1 as the TSI and 2 as the CTI.

responseMessages.message: Accepted (the request to update the resource has been accepted but the resource itself is not yet necessarily updated.)
Bad Request. Typically invalid or incomplete parameter(s). See the 'message' property for detail of the error.
Insufficient authorization. Basic Authentication is missing, invalid, or permissions are insufficient for the operation.
No such Alarm found
